verses.verse: IN Judah is God known; his name is great in Israel.
In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.
There broke he the arms of the bow, the shield, and the sword, in the battle.
Thou art all glorious and excellent from thy mighty mountain.
All the foolish of heart were dismayed; the mighty men of valor slept their last sleep.
Their hands prevailed not because of thy rebuke, O God of Jacob; the horsemen are cast into a dead sleep.
Thou, even thou, art to be feared; who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?
Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth saw it and trembled
When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth.
For the wisdom of man shall praise thee; the remainder of his wrath shalt thou restrain.
Vow and fulfil thy vows to the LORD thy God; let all that be round about him bring presents to him who is to be revered.
He shall humble the pride of the rulers; he is dreaded by the kings of the earth.
